mapper.select: /* com.neofect.gts.services.ho.repository.HO03040Repository.getSucpList */ SELECT A.MEMBER_ID, A.NAME, A.GUBUN_DIV, A.DEPT_ID, B.DEPT_NAME, A.MEMBER_DIV, A.WORK_YN FROM CODE_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN CODE_DEPT B ON B.DEPT_ID = A.DEPT_ID WHERE NVL(A.DEPT_ID,'%') LIKE #{deptid} AND NVL(WORK_YN, 'Y') LIKE #{workYn} ORDER BY A.MEMBER_ID

/* com.neofect.gts.services.ho.repository.HO03040Repository.HO03040C02 */ SELECT A.MEMBER_ID, A.DEPT_ID, B.DEPT_NAME, A.PRINT_SEQ FROM CODE_DEPT_AUTHORITY A INNER JOIN CODE_DEPT B ON B.DEPT_ID = A.DEPT_ID WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{id} ORDER BY A.PRINT_SEQ
